intro: Scorzonera taiwanensis, commonly known as Taiwan scorzonera, is a flowering plant native to Taiwan. It belongs to the family Asteraceae, which includes daisies and sunflowers. The plant is characterized by its hairy stems and yellow flowers with prominent central disks. It typically grows in open, sunny habitats such as grasslands and rocky areas. Scorzonera taiwanensis is of interest to botanists due to its unique morphology and limited distribution.
